scripts.install: cd backend/SeaDuelServer && npm install && cd - && cd angular-app/SeaDuel && npm install && cd - && cd desktop-app && npm install && cd - && cd mobile-app/SeaDuelMobile && npm install && cd -
scripts.build-web: cd backend/SeaDuelServer && npm run build && cd -
scripts.build-android: cd mobile-app/SeaDuelMobile && npm run build-android && cd -
scripts.build-ios: cd mobile-app/SeaDuelMobile && npm run build-ios && cd -
scripts.build-desktop: cd desktop-app && npm run build && cd -
scripts.start-db: cd backend/SeaDuelServer && npm run db && cd -
scripts.start-backend: cd backend/SeaDuelServer && npm run dev && cd -
scripts.start: npm run start-db | npm run start-backend
scripts.android: npm run start-db | npm run start-backend
scripts.ios: npm run start-db | npm run start-backend
